connection.name: connection
connection.summary: Returns a connection with the given user@host selecting the given database.

hostId.name: hostId
hostId.summary: Returns the ID of a connection.

countHosts.name: countHosts
countHosts.summary: Returns the number of connections in the options.

hosts.name: hosts
hosts.summary: Returns a list of the connections available.

fullHosts.name: fullHosts
fullHosts.summary: Returns the list of the connections

dbId.name: dbId
dbId.summary: Returns the option's ID of a database.

countDbs.name: countDbs
countDbs.summary: Returns the number of DBs available for the given connection.

dbs.name: dbs
dbs.summary: Returns the list of DBs available for the given connection.

fullDbs.name: fullDbs
fullDbs.summary: Returns the list of DBs available for the given connection with statistics.

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.summary: Returns the ID of a table from the options table.

countTables.name: countTables
countTables.summary: Returnms the number of tables in the given database.

tables.name: tables
tables.summary: Returns a list of tables in the given database.

fullTables.name: fullTables
fullTables.summary: Returns a list of tables in the given database with its statistics.

tableFromItem.name: tableFromItem
tableFromItem.summary: Gets the name of a table from an item's ID (key or column).

tableIdFromItem.name: tableIdFromItem
tableIdFromItem.summary: Retrieves the ID of a table from an item's ID (key or column).

dbFromTable.name: dbFromTable
dbFromTable.summary: Retrieves a database name from the ID of a table.

dbIdFromTable.name: dbIdFromTable
dbIdFromTable.summary: Returns the ID of a DB through the given table.

dbFromItem.name: dbFromItem
dbFromItem.summary: Returns the name of a DB through the ID of an item (key or column).

dbIdFromItem.name: dbIdFromItem
dbIdFromItem.summary: Returns the ID of a DB through the ID of an item (key or column).

columnId.name: columnId

countColumns.name: countColumns
countColumns.summary: Returns the number of columns for the given DB.

columns.name: columns
columns.summary: Returns a list of the columns for the given table.

fullColumns.name: fullColumns
fullColumns.summary: Returns a list of the columns for the given table with all their characteristics.

keyId.name: keyId
keyId.summary: Returns the ID of a key in the given table.

countKeys.name: countKeys
countKeys.summary: Returns the number of keys in the given table.

keys.name: keys
keys.summary: Returns a list of keys for the giuven table.

fullKeys.name: fullKeys
fullKeys.summary: For the moment an alias of get_keys.

remove.name: remove
remove.summary: Deletes a table and all its descendants from the options table.

removeAll.name: removeAll
removeAll.summary: Deletes a database and all its descendants from the options table.

removeHost.name: removeHost
removeHost.summary: Deletes a connection from the options table.

modelize.name: modelize
modelize.summary: Returns a database model as bbn\Db::modelize but with options IDs.

importHost.name: importHost
importHost.summary: Imports a database's structure into the options table.

arguments.name: cfg
arguments.description: If true will connect to the database and get its structure

importDb.name: importDb
importDb.summary: Imports a database's structure into the options table.

arguments.name: host
arguments.description: If true will connect to the database and get its structure

retrieveHost.name: retrieveHost
retrieveHost.summary: Returns the ID of the host of the given DB.

importTable.name: importTable
importTable.summary: Imports a table's structure into the options table.

arguments.name: table
arguments.description: db The database to which import the table (its id_parent)

import.name: import
import.summary: Import a table structure in the options table.

importAll.name: importAll
importAll.summary: Imports a whole database structure in the options table.

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

getOptionsObject.name: getOptionsObject

getOptionId.name: getOptionId
getOptionId.summary: Returns The option's ID of a category, i.e. direct children of option's root

getOptionsIds.name: getOptionsIds

getAppuiOptionId.name: getAppuiOptionId
getAppuiOptionId.summary: Returns The option's ID of a category, i.e. direct children of option's root

getAppuiOptionsIds.name: getAppuiOptionsIds
